parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front suspension can cause loss of control, instability, and accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The front end wobbles or dives when braking
and the driver may lose control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear suspension can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the motorcycle, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: and the driver may lose control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the motorcycle, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: the motorcycle does not shift properly
and the driver may lose control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the shock absorbers can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the motorcycle, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: causing instability and loss of control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the kickstand and floorboards can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the motorcycle, especially during turns.
symptoms: The kickstand hits the pavement during shallow turns
causing the motorcycle to jump upright and lose control
and the floorboards are too low

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer and dealers to address these issues can cause frustration, delay, and further safety risks for motorcycle owners.
symptoms: The manufacturer and dealers fail to provide parts
leading to prolonged periods of unsafe motorcycle operation.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An electrical system shortage can cause the headlights to fail, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: turn signals cannot be turned on
rear tail lights fill with water and fail.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Headlight failure can cause reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: unable to use vehicle at night due to frequent headlight failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress in Rear Tail Lights
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress in rear tail lights can cause light failure, reducing visibility and increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Rear tail lights fill with water

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure Due to Cylinder Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine due to cylinder defects can cause the motorcycle to stall or die while in motion, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The engine stalls or dies while in motion

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition module can cause the engine to misfire and stall, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: the motorcycle stalls or dies while in motion

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to properly address the handlebar recall can lead to loose handlebars, loss of steering control, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: impossible to drive due to lack of control on steering

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the triple tree can cause the handlebars to become loose, leading to loss of steering control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: impossible to drive due to lack of control on steering

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay or unavailability of recall repairs can leave vehicles in an unsafe condition, putting drivers and passengers at risk.
symptoms: manufacturer has not sent parts to dealership
